151112.content:
Britney just continued to eat and eat, never realizing how loud she was being. She continued to munch and chew food like a pig due to the sweet taste of these fantastic cookies. It wasn't long before one of Bittersweet's minions overheard the munching noise and investigated. She found Britney in the corner of the room eating her third box of cookies. Once she noticed the shadow of the obese minion she stopped eating and prepared to attack the minion, though she failed miserably. Since she ate those cookies so fast, she quickly got a stomach cramp and couldn't defend herself against the large woman. Realizing that she had the advantage, the minion picked up Britney and gave her a powerful bear hug. Britney tried to resist but she was still too full from the cookies to fight.

"Hey Boss! Look, we've got an intruder!"

"What? Who would..." Inga Bittersweet stopped in mid sentence once she got a good look at the intruder. The face didn't look familiar, but the jumpsuit did. It was identical to the ones Alex, Sam, and Clover wore except in a blue color.

"You're from WHOOP aren't you?"

"Yeah. I'm Britney, agent from WHOOP, and I'm going to stop your scheme."

"I'm so worried, or at least I would be if it weren't for two facts I know. One, my minion has you trapped in her arms. Two, I can tell from the crumbs on your face that you're already hooked on my latest batch of cookies."

Britney hated to admit it, but Bittersweet was right. It would be very difficult to stop her in a factory filled with something that made weakened her will power as soon as it entered her mouth. Plus, even though her minions were all fat girls, they seemed to be able to use their fat as strength.

"What should we do with her boss?"

Bittersweet began to think to herself. She could use Britney as a test subject for experiments to see how addictive and fattening the cookies are, or she could her as bait for the other spies from WHOOP. She could then lure Clover, Alex, and Sam into a trap, fatten them along with Britney, and get revenge on them all! Of course that option might take a while depending on when they find out she's missing, and if they rescue her she'll lose a potential test subject.

1511121.content:
"Well, I suppose we need someone to test my new batch on." Bittersweet said. "Take her to the 'Testing Room.'"

The minions raised their eyebrows in surprise. They had never seen anyone go into the testing room before. Obeying their master, they carried Britney into this enigmatic room and dropped her there, leaving themselves.

"Enjoy your stay here, spy!" Bittersweet said right before closing the door. Britney was now trapped in a dark room, unaware of what they were going to do to her.

"I've got to get out of here..." Britney said, searching through her belt for a gadget that could help.

Just then, the lights turned on in the room, and to Britney's delight there were a ton of boxes of cookies standing in there. Britney drooled in delight, and then grabbed a box and began to eat every cookie inside it.

In another room, Bittersweet was watching everything on a monitor, writing things down on a notepad...
